requirement.hlr: want to create a login button

epics.title: Design and Implement Login Button
epics.description: This epic involves the design and implementation of a login button that will enable users to access their accounts. This includes creating the button, setting up the authentication process, and ensuring the button is responsive and user-friendly.
epics.business_value: The login button is a critical feature that will allow users to access their accounts securely and conveniently. This will enhance user experience and increase user engagement.
acceptance_criteria: Login button is visible on the homepage
Login button directs users to the authentication page
Login button is responsive and user-friendly
assumptions: Users are familiar with the concept of logging in

epics.title: Setup Authentication Process
epics.description: This epic involves setting up the authentication process that will be triggered when users click on the login button. This includes validating user credentials, handling authentication errors, and redirecting users to their accounts upon successful login.
epics.business_value: A robust authentication process is essential for protecting user data and preventing unauthorized access. This will build user trust and ensure compliance with data protection regulations.
acceptance_criteria: Users are redirected to their accounts upon successful login
assumptions: Database for storing user credentials is available

user_stories.title: Design Login Button
user_stories.description: As a UI designer, I want to design a login button so that users can have a clear entry point to access their accounts.
acceptance_criteria: Given that I have designed a login button, when users view the login page, then they should see the login button
Given that the login button is clicked, when users are on the login page, then they should be redirected to the login process
definition_of_done: Login button is visible on the login page
Login button redirects to the login process when clicked

user_stories.title: Implement Login Button
user_stories.description: As a developer, I want to implement the login button so that users can interact with it to access their accounts.
acceptance_criteria: Given that the login button is implemented, when users click on it, then they should be redirected to the login process
Given that the login button is implemented, when users view the login page, then they should see the login button
definition_of_done: Login button is visible on the login page
Login button redirects to the login process when clicked

user_stories.title: Setup Authentication Process
user_stories.description: As a developer, I want to setup the authentication process so that users can login to their accounts.
acceptance_criteria: Given that the authentication process is setup, when users enter their credentials and click login, then their credentials should be validated
Given that the authentication process is setup, when users enter valid credentials and click login, then they should be redirected to their accounts
Given that the authentication process is setup, when users enter invalid credentials and click login, then they should see an error message
definition_of_done: Credentials are validated when users attempt to login
Users are redirected to their accounts when they enter valid credentials
Users see an error message when they enter invalid credentials
